TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_uaadihanu_sakidaya, title = uaadihanu_sakidaya, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/uaadihanu_sakidaya} }

S.FORM: u saka buliyas nu sakidaya. namakayni i kadipunan kyalu acucaay papi depiti nu dipun ku sakidaya i panpancahan kaw. kucaaytu ka buliyas ku sakidaya . ahican naca tada matenes tu malapancah kyu. mananam tu mala pancah. hidahida satu makatukuh ayda. wyniya kusaka kayi nukatuuday nupinacadan a taluma' isakidaya. ayda asangalebentu. uwawa nuwawa tu maliyuliyuhtu. ku adiwawa nu aydaay a tademaw. ma ngaleb tu upacah kami satuway. anu matinengay kaw mu simsim ku balucu' kumu duduc tukakawsan nu udip i. kacay pi kingkiu tu kamu nuudip. atu lalangawan nu nyadu' kacikalecad kaci kasa musimsim. maadih tu katikatinengan. kuni palekal tu lalikid i niyadu atu dadiu nu nyadu'. u tuudamin a lalangawen masasengi tu tunusakidaya kacikasa. mi baat tunupacah cikasakasa mudateng.

o saka boliyas no sakidaya. namakayni i kadiponan kyalo acocaay papi depiti no dipon ko sakidaya i panpancahan kaw. kocaayto ka boliyas ko sakidaya . ahican naca tada matenes to malapancah kyo. mananam to mala pancah. hidahida sato makatokoh ayda. wyniya kosaka kayi nokatooday nopinacadan a taloma' isakidaya. ayda asangalebento. owawa nowawa to maliyoliyohto. ko adiwawa no aydaay a tademaw. ma ngaleb to opacah kami satoway. ano matinengay kaw mo simsim ko baloco' komo dodoc tokakawsan no odip i. kacay pi kingkio to kamo noodip. ato lalangawan no nyado' kacikalecad kaci kasa mosimsim. maadih to katikatinengan. koni palekal to lalikid i niyado ato dadio no nyado'. o toodamin a lalangawen masasengi to tonosakidaya kacikasa. mi baat tonopacah cikasakasa modateng.
